short_summary: audiology consults, hearing tests, repairs, fitting of hearing aids, batteries for hearing aids, and written documentation for client’s medical file
full_summary:
Title: Audiology Consults and Hearing Aids
### National Interest Reference No.: PW-KIN-655-8683
### Tender Closing Date: 2022-09-12 14:00:00 (UTC-04:00)

### Agency Contact Information
Patrick Semple
E-mail: [patrick.semple@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca](mailto:patrick.semple@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca)
Phone: (613) 449-3112
Fax: (613) 545-8067

### Legal Notice
This opportunity is open to suppliers able to supply the equivalent Canadian product(s) or service(s) or Equal in Value and equivalent in Quality at the time of the bid.

### Description
The Correctional Service of Canada is seeking services under the National Essential Health Services Framework at Warkworth Institution. The key tasks include providing audiology consults, hearing tests, repairs, and fitting or replacement of hearing aids, in addition to providing written documentation for the client's file and the resident's medical doctor.

### Conditions of Participation
* The bid must be submitted electronically using the Canada Post epost Connect application.  
* Procurement Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
* Bids must be submitted in a timely manner before the closing date.
* Suppliers are required to comply with the guidelines provided in this opportunity.

### Important Notice to Suppliers
Suppliers are required to submit their bids electronically using the Canada Post epost Connect application to respond to this bid solicitation. To use epost Connect to submit your bid, or to get more information on its use, please send an email to the Ontario Region Bid Receiving Unit at [TPSGC.orreceptiondessoumissions-orbidreceiving.PWGSC@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:TPSGC.orreceptiondessoumissions-orbidreceiving.PWGSC@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).

### Notes
Documents may be downloaded from the Canada Buys website.  
A security requirement is present in this work package.

### Bid Surgeries Required
Required only for specific events.
